name: BeatFlyer Lite
description:
Animate your artboards in a few clicks with a lite and free version of BeatFlyer.


Animate your layers independently combining as many effects as you want among the dozens available (some insanely powerful ðŸ”¥).


Group your layers properly before running the plugin to give the same combination of effects to multiple elements.


Before using it, you might want to look at the intro video.


Enjoy!


P.S.: For many more functionalities, check out the full version: https://beatflyer.com/
